statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_checks;
SELECT trade_id, security FROM regulatory_compliance_checks;
SELECT security, compliance_check_result FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE trader_id = 123;
SELECT trade_id, trader_id, compliance_check_result FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE security = 'AAPL' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE compliance_check_result = TRUE;
SELECT trade_id, security FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE trader_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT security FROM regulatory_compliance_checks ORDER BY security DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_checks WHERE compliance_check_result = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT trader_id, COUNT(trade_id) AS trade_count FROM regulatory_compliance_checks GROUP BY trader_id HAVING trade_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM trading_activities;
SELECT trader_name, trade_amount FROM trading_activities WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT trade_id, trader_name FROM trading_activities ORDER BY trade_id DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trade_amount FROM trading_activities WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_date FROM trading_activities WHERE trader_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM trading_activities ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_amount ASC
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_amount FROM trading_activities WHERE trader_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_date FROM trading_activities WHERE trade_amount > 10000
SELECT t.trade_id, t.trader_name, c.is_compliant FROM trading_activities t INNER JOIN compliance_checks c ON t.trade_id = c.trade_id
SELECT t.trader_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Trades FROM trading_activities t GROUP BY t.trader_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5
SELECT * FROM trades;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_type, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY';
SELECT trader_name, trader_city, trader_country FROM traders ORDER BY trader_name DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT check_id, trade_id, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY check_id ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_type, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_quantity > 100 AND trade_price < 1000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trader_name, trader_city, trader_country FROM traders WHERE trader_city = 'New York' AND trader_country = 'USA' ORDER BY trader_name ASC;
SELECT trade_id, check_description, check_status FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY trade_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.trade_id, t.trade_type, c.check_description, c.check_status FROM trades t JOIN compliance_checks c ON t.trade_id = c.trade_id WHERE c.check_status = 'Failed' AND t.trade_quantity >= 500 ORDER BY t.trade_id ASC;
SELECT t.trade_id, t.trade_quantity, t.trade_price, tr.trader_name, tr.trader_city, tr.trader_country FROM trades t JOIN traders tr ON t.trade_id = tr.trader_id ORDER BY t.trade_date DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_checks;
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM regulatory_checks ORDER BY check_name DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_amount FROM trade_activities WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_check_results WHERE result_status = 'Fail';
SELECT log_id, executed_by, execution_timestamp FROM regulatory_check_logs ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_checks WHERE check_id = 1;
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM regulatory_checks ORDER BY check_name ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_amount FROM trade_activities WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT result_id, result_status, result_details FROM regulatory_check_results WHERE result_status = 'Passed';
SELECT log_id, check_id, executed_by, execution_timestamp FROM regulatory_check_logs ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval;
SELECT approval_status, approval_date FROM regulatory_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM trade ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT counterparty, trade_amount FROM trade WHERE trade_amount > 10000;
SELECT activity_id, trade_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM trade_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Cancellation';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval;
SELECT id, approval_status FROM regulatory_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_amount, counterparty FROM trade ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM trade_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Transaction' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;

SELECT compliance_check.check_id, compliance_check.check_result, trade.trade_id, trade.trade_amount FROM compliance_check JOIN trade ON compliance_check.trade_id = trade.trade_id WHERE check_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY trade.trade_amount DESC;
